ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: I disagree, I do not believe that we should receive the Dual Wield skill. A single deadly wepon is all that we should carry. I think a specialization in one
ygData.messageBody:
I disagree, I do not believe that we should receive the Dual Wield skill. A
single deadly wepon is all that we should carry. I think a specialization in
one wepon skill would enhance this even firther. This would fit the Knight type
of class quite well. We may be able to learn all types of wepons but
specialization in a single wepon as our main instrument of destruction!!! I
like this idea.

Tindaen of the Rathe server

At 4/26/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>
>No, I don't think we should get dual wield. It make us way too powerful. In
>addition, Paladins and SKs are more stereotyped to use two handed weapons
>than having a blade in each hand; thus, giving us dual wield would cause us
>to lose our uniqueness. I do think that we should get the Lifetap series and
>a 100% working HT though.
>
>
>>Do you think Shadow Knights should get duel weild?
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Looking to expand your world?
